PEERMONT METCOURT

The 3-star select-services Peermont Metcourt hotel at Rio in Klerksdorp is a true reflection of the exhilaration and exuberance of the Rio Carnival in Brazil. In-line with the theme, the hotelâ€™s interior is decorated in pink, white and touches of azure blue. Strategically placed lighting in the private and public areas enhances the clean, contemporary style, so does the Brazilian-style mural in each of the 70 hotel bedrooms. The hotel is styled for both comfort and convenience suitable for business and leisure travellers.

The Peermont Metcourt Hotel features: 30x Classic Rooms (2 Twin Beds), 20x Classic Rooms (1 King Bed), 10x Superior Rooms (2 Twin Beds), 5x Superior Rooms (1 King Bed), 4x Executive Suites (1 King Bed), 12x Superior King Rooms, and 1x Special Assistance Room. All rooms include access to the F.L.A.G. CafÃ© restaurant with a small adjoining bar and lounge, as well as the swimming pool with its relaxing pool terrace set in beautifully landscaped gardens. Also included is access to our exclusive business center with free unlimited Wi-Fi as well as secure parking.
